'''Arataki Gang's Instant Ramen''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Provisionally Perpetual Beetle Battle!}}.

==Trivia==
* This item features [[Unattributed Ramen Voucher]]'s ramen logo.
